item.title: 想用 Terraform 與 kOps 也得寫個筆記
item.description: 流水帳開始 😂 Terraform 先裝點東西吧 來安裝 terraform brew tap hashicorp/tap brew install hashicorp/tap/terraform 首先登入你的 aws iam 建立一組 Access key, Secret key 直接產一個 main.tf 檔案~ 下面有指令直接來跑跑看，你應該要多一個 ec2 機器👍 provider "aws" { # access_key = "$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID" # secret_key = "$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY" region = "ap-northeast-1" } data "aws_ami" "ubuntu" { most_recent = true filter { name = "name" values = ["ubuntu/images/hvm-ssd/ubuntu-bionic-18.04-amd64-server-*"] } filter { name = "root-device-type" values = ["ebs"] } filter { name = "virtualization-type" values = ["hvm"] } owners = ["099720109477"] # Canonical } # resource <resource_type> <resource_name> resource "aws_instance" "example" { ami = data.
